summary: Armor and Clothing re-placer, now EVERYBODY ARE NUDE
descriptionHtml:
*** EVERYBODY ARE NUDE ***

These are basic meshes re-placer to Armor and Cloth.
Only visible as nude in the body/torso part.
All Armor & Cloth are still equipped, but invisible to our eyes.
The bracers/gloves, boots/shoes are remain intacts.
The Textures are based on 'DIMONIZED UNP female body' feel free to change it others (Caliente's Blessed body if you prefer)

WARNINGS!!!
I'm trying to made an "esp file" out of it, but failed.
Any help will be greatly welcome.
In the meantime, to be safe - backup these folders, so you can easily revert to whatever you had before:
* Data->textures->actors->character->female
* Data->meshes->actors
* Data->meshes->armors
* Data->meshes->clothes
Delete any files from a previous body re-placer to avoid conflicts.

Version 1.0
initial release, for vanilla Skyrim.
It's still usable for Dawnguard, Dragonborn and Heartfire, any extra Armor & Cloth from DLC's are untouch though.


Special thanks to:
- Caliente for CBBE Body
- Dimon99 for DIMONIZED UNP female body
- MAK for inspired on Remodeled Armor, so i know what file i'm looked for.
- All of you that endorsed me.
- Nexusmods.com for hosting worldwide collaborative works.
author: Cheapster
